package_info.mp_subtitle: The module that brings a prospect management system to your website.
package_info.mp_description:
This module adds 2 different tools and 1 plugin:
- the prospect tool where prospect are added from a contact form on websites, will allow to see all prospects and to export them
- the theme tool will allow to create a question and answers in multiple languages, in order to fill a dropdown (ex: Who are you? Teacher, Student, Employee, etc)
The plugin will allow to drag'n'drop a contact form on a template and edit its parameters.
The plugin also allows to configure the form to the needs of the project by allowing to reorder fields, make mandatory ones or even disable those unused.
